cards.Name: Owl - Pirate Lookout
cards.Flavor_Text: “I say, land who! Er, ho—land ho!”
cards.Body_Text: Well Spotted: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opposing character gets -1 {s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Lilo - Escape Artist
cards.Flavor_Text: “You can't keep me away from the fun!”
cards.Body_Text: NO PLACE I'D RATHER BE - At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard, you may play her and she enters play exerted.

cards.Name: Winnie the Pooh - Hunny Pirate
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
We're Pirates, You See: Whenever this character quests, you may pay 1 {i} less for the next Pirate character you play this turn.

cards.Name: Gopher - Ship's Carpenter
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I keep fixin’ this same ding-danged hole! I should
start charging overtime, plus 10 percent.”

cards.Name: Simba - Happy-Go-Lucky
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Look at that water, and those birds! Wow. Wait 'til
Timon and Pumbaa see this!”

cards.Name: Chip - Friend Indeed
cards.Flavor_Text: “Come on, Dale—this is no time for hanging around!”
cards.Body_Text: DALE'S PARTNER - When you play this character, chosen character gets +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Dale - Friend in Need
cards.Flavor_Text: “But Chip, hanging around is what I do best!”
cards.Body_Text: CHIP'S PARTNER - This character enters play exerted unless you have a character named Chip in play.

cards.Name: David - Impressive Surfer
cards.Flavor_Text: “Grab a board and come on out! Choice waves today.”
cards.Body_Text: SHOWING OFF - While you have a character named Nani in play, this character gets +2 {l}.

cards.Name: Prince Naveen - Vigilant First Mate
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Naveen.)
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Prince Naveen - Carefree Explorer
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Dance little friends—fill the air with light and joy.
Achidanza! It is like seeing music come to life.”

cards.Name: Chief Bogo - Gazelle Fan
cards.Body_Text: YOU LIKE GAZELLE TOO? - While you have a character named Gazelle in play, this character gains Singer 6. (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.)

cards.Name: Chip - Ranger Leader
cards.Body_Text: THE VALUE OF FRIENDSHIP - While you have a character named Dale in play, this character gains Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Monterey Jack - Good-Hearted Ranger
cards.Flavor_Text:
“There's only one thing I like more than cheese—
nothin'.”

cards.Name: Chip 'n' Dale - Recovery Rangers
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on topo of one of your characters named Chip or Dale.)
(This character counts as being named both Chip and Dale.)
Search and Rescue: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a character from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Judy Hopps - Resourceful Rabbit
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add thier {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)
Need Some Help?: At the end of your turn, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

cards.Name: Tiana - Restaurant Owner
cards.Flavor_Text:
“The only way to get what you want in this world is
through hard work.”
cards.Body_Text: SPECIAL RESERVATION - Whenever a character of yours is challenged while this character is exerted, the challenging character gets -3 {s} this turn unless their player pays 3 {i}.

cards.Name: Grand Councilwoman - Federation Leader
cards.Flavor_Text: “I want an expert on this planet in here now!”
cards.Body_Text: FIND IT! - Whenever this character quests, your other Alien characters get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Dale - Mischievous Ranger
cards.Body_Text: NUTS ABOUT PRANKS - When you play this character, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your discard to give chosen character -3 {s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Nani - Caring Sister
cards.Body_Text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character’s {s} this turn.)
I Am So Sorry: 2 {i} - Chosen character gets -1 {s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Simba - Pride Protector
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.)
Understand The Balance: At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready your other characters.

cards.Name: Kanga - Nurturing Mother
cards.Flavor_Text:
“My, you've had an awfully big adventure. Now it's
time to rest.”
cards.Body_Text: SAFE AND SOUND - Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours can't be challenged until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Rabbit - Indignant Pirate
cards.Flavor_Text: “See? I told you it was dangerous out there!”
cards.Body_Text: BE MORE CAREFUL - When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Roo - Littlest Pirate
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Look at all my ships, mama! We're going on the
Azurite Sea!”
cards.Body_Text: I'M A PIRATE TOO! - When you play this character, you may give chosen character -2 {s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Mr. Litwak - Arcade Owner
cards.Flavor_Text: “Come on in. Good to see you.”
cards.Body_Text: THE GANG'S ALL HERE - Once during your turn, whenever you play another character, you may ready this character. He can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Jim Hawkins - Honorable Pirate
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Hire a Crew: When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Pirate character cards and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Stitch - Little Trickster
cards.Flavor_Text:
Always ready in an emergency—usually because
he caused it.
cards.Body_Text: NEED A HAND? - This character gets +1 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Good Job!
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Be proud of that badge. You earned it.”
—Judy Hopps
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gets +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: I Won't Give In
cards.Flavor_Text: 'Til I reach the end, and then I'll start again
cards.Body_Text: - A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.

cards.Name: Rescue Rangers Away!
cards.Body_Text: Count the number of characters you have in play. Chosen character loses {s} equal to that number until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Safe and Sound
cards.Flavor_Text: “Here I am, mama!”
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character of yours can’t be challenged until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Naveen's Ukulele
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I love this instrument! I strum, everyone dances.”
—Prince Naveen
cards.Body_Text: MAKE IT SING - Chosen character counts as having +3 cost to sing songs this turn.

cards.Name: Pooh Pirate Ship
cards.Flavor_Text: The friendliest ship on the Azurite Sea.
cards.Body_Text: MAKE A RESCUE - Return a Pirate character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Scrump
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Her head is too big. So I pretend a bug laid eggs in her
ears...”
—Lilo
cards.Body_Text: I MADE HER - Chosen character gets -2 {s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Hundred Acre Island - Pooh's Home
cards.Body_Text: FRIENDS FOREVER - During an opponent's turn, whenever a character is banished while here, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Sugar Rush Speedway - Finish Line
cards.Body_Text: BRING IT HOME, KID! - When you move a character here from a location, you may banish this location to gain 3 lore and draw 3 cards.

cards.Name: Hades - Lord of the Dead
cards.Flavor_Text:
“You could say I'm big on the catch, not so much
on the release.”
cards.Body_Text: SOUL COLLECTOR - During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your other characters is banished, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Madam Mim - Tiny Adversary
cards.Body_Text:
Challenger +1 (While challenging, this character gets +1 {s}.)
Zim Zabberim Bim: Your other characters gain Challenger +1.

cards.Name: Genie - Excited Shipbuilder
cards.Flavor_Text:
“For the indecisive sailor we have three, count 'em,
three ships in one! It sails, it flies, it juliennes fries!
All for the low price of just one wish.”

cards.Name: Sisu - In Her Element
cards.Flavor_Text: “I'm a water dragon. This is water. It's sort of my thing.”
cards.Body_Text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: The White Rose - Jewel of the Garden
cards.Flavor_Text:
“You can learn a lot of things from the flowers...”
—Alice
cards.Body_Text: A WEALTH OF HAPPINESS - When you play this character, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Juju - Mama Odie's Companion
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Juju! You get yourself out of that there magic, you bad boy!”
—Mama Odie
cards.Body_Text: BEES' KNEES - When you play this character, move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Rafiki - Shaman of the Savanna
cards.Flavor_Text:
“The signs, they never lie. The snake thinks he's
planned for everything...Oh, ho, ho! He forgot
about the owl. There's hope yet!”

cards.Name: Tinker Bell - Fast Flier
cards.Flavor_Text:
She zips through the waves without a drop of
water touching her.
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: The Carpenter - Dinner Companion
cards.Flavor_Text:
The Carpenter's stomach growled as he clenched
his hammer tight...
cards.Body_Text: I'LL GET YOU! - When this character is banished, you may exert chosen character.

cards.Name: Iago - Reappearing Parrot
cards.Flavor_Text: “You think you can get rid of me that easy?!”
cards.Body_Text: GUESS WHO - When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

cards.Name: The Walrus - Greedy Gourmand
cards.Flavor_Text:
...While the Walrus finished off the lot, down to
the final bite.

cards.Name: Scar - Tempestuous Lion
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {s}.)

cards.Name: Tinker Bell - Queen of the Azurite Fairies
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Shining Example: Whenever this character quests, your other Fairy characters get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Diablo - Obedient Raven
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Go, and do not fail me.”
—Maleficent
cards.Body_Text: FLY, MY PET! - When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: March Hare - Absurd Host
cards.Flavor_Text: “Clear the table? Don't mind if I do!”
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Magic Carpet - Amazing Flier
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Carpet's always come through for us before! He
won't let us down now.”
—Jasmine

cards.Name: Rafiki - Ethereal Guide
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 7 (You may pay 7 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Rafiki.)
Astral Attunement: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may draw a card.

cards.Name: Genie - Wish Fulfilled
cards.Flavor_Text: “Oh, does that feel good!”
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
What Comes Next?: When you play this character, draw a card.

cards.Name: Sisu - Uniting Dragon
cards.Body_Text: TRUST BUILDS TRUST - Whenever this character quests, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon character card, put it into your hand and repeat this effect. Otherwise, put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.Name: Madam Mim - Truly Marvelous
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I'll give you a sporting chance. I'm mad about
games, you know.”
cards.Body_Text: OH, BAT GIZZARDS - Gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Yzma - Conniving Chemist
cards.Flavor_Text:
“One of these has got to work. Let's see what
happens.”
cards.Body_Text: FEEL THE POWER - If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand.

cards.Name: Mama Odie - Solitary Sage
cards.Body_Text: I'VE GOT TO DO EVERYTHING AROUND HERE - Whenever you play a song, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Peter Pan - Shadow Catcher
cards.Flavor_Text: “You're not getting away from me this time!”
cards.Body_Text: GOTCHA! - During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, exert chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Mad Hatter - Eccentric Host
cards.Body_Text: WE'LL HAVE TO LOOK INTO THIS - Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top card of chosen player's deck. Put it on top of their deck or into their discard.

cards.Name: A Very Merry Unbirthday
cards.Flavor_Text:
Now blow the candle out, my dear
And make your wish come true
cards.Body_Text: - A character with cost 1 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.

cards.Name: Genie - Wonderful Trickster
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
Your Reward Awaits: Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
Forbidden Treasure: At the end of your turn, put all the cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.Name: Making Magic
cards.Flavor_Text:
“That's got some zang to it!”
—Mama Odie
cards.Body_Text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character. Draw a card.

cards.Name: Lose the Way
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Well, when one's lost, I suppose it's good advice to stay
where you are until someone finds you.”
—Alice
cards.Body_Text: Exert chosen character. Then, you may choose and discard a card. If you do, the exerted character can’t ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.Name: Seeking the Half Crown
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I see the other half, in the Inklands. Quick, my tiny
companion! Fetch me that crown!”
—Jafar
cards.Body_Text: - For each Sorcerer character you have in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play this action.

cards.Name: Maleficent's Staff
cards.Body_Text: BACK, FOOLS! - Whenever one of your opponents' characters, items, or locations is returned to their hand from play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Mad Hatter's Teapot
cards.Flavor_Text:
Alice: “My goodness, the tea missed the cup!”
Mad Hatter: “No, no, my dear—the cup missed the tea!”
cards.Body_Text: NO ROOM, NO ROOM - Each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their discard.

cards.Name: Pixie Dust
cards.Body_Text: FAITH AND TRUST - Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive until the start of your next turn. (While challenging, they get +2 {s}. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Fairy Ship - Royal Vessel
cards.Flavor_Text:
Legends say that whenever something goes missing, it's been taken to
build the fairy ships of the Azurite Sea.

cards.Name: Mystical Tree - Mama Odie's Home
cards.Body_Text: NOT BAD - At the start of your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character here to chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Jasmine - Royal Seafarer
cards.Body_Text: BY ORDER OF THE PRINCESS - When you play this character, choose one: • Exert chosen damaged character. • Chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Captain Hook - Underhanded
cards.Body_Text: INSPIRES DREAD - While this character is exerted, opposing Pirate characters can't quest.

cards.Name: Stitch - Alien Buccaneer
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.)
Ready For Action: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may put an action card from your discard on the top of your deck.

cards.Name: Go Go Tomago - Darting Dynamo
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Stop Whining, Women Up: When you play this character, you may pay 2 {i} to gain lore equal to the damage on chosen opposing character.

cards.Name: Honey Lemon - Chemical Genius
cards.Flavor_Text: "You're going to love this!"
cards.Body_Text: Here's The Best Part - When you play this character, you may pay 2 {i} to have each opponent choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Fred - Mascot by Day
cards.Flavor_Text: “...but by night...I am also a school mascot.”
cards.Body_Text: HOW COOL IS THAT - Whenever this character is challenged, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Tootles - Lost Boy
cards.Flavor_Text:
Every Lost Boy has a favorite hiding spot. Tootles
has twelve.

cards.Name: Dawson - Basil's Assistant
cards.Flavor_Text:
“By Jove, he must be around here somewhere.
Basil! Basil! Shout if—aaahhh!”

cards.Name: Heathcliff - Stoic Butler
cards.Flavor_Text:
Loyal butler, training target, helicopter pilot—and
completely unflappable.
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Basil - Hypnotized Mouse
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Hmm. Footprints from a large...owl? With
droplets of water? Clearly some avian menace
has crossed the Azurite Sea and absconded with
the crown!”
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Donald Duck - First Mate
cards.Flavor_Text:
“A promotion! It's about time someone recognized
my natural leadership skills!”
cards.Body_Text: CAPTAIN ON DECK - While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +2 {l}.

cards.Name: Daisy Duck - Pirate Captain
cards.Flavor_Text:
“The answers we're looking for are on the other
side of that maze, I just know it!”
cards.Body_Text: DISTANT SHORES - Whenever one of your Pirate characters quests while at a location, draw a card.

cards.Name: Mertle Edmonds - Lilo's Rival
cards.Flavor_Text: “Get out of my way before I run you over.”

cards.Name: Prince Phillip - Royal Explorer
cards.Flavor_Text:
A clear head and a calm hand will see you through
uncharted waters.
cards.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.Name: Jasmine - Royal Commodore
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
Ruler of the Seas: When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, return all other exerted characters to their players’ hands.

cards.Name: Peter Pan - Never Land Prankster
cards.Body_Text: LOOK INNOCENT - This character enters play exerted.

cards.Name: Hercules - Baby Demigod
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)
Strong Like His Dad: 3 {i} - Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character.

cards.Name: Alistair Krei - Ambitious Entrepreneur
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Sleek yet strong...These inkrunners are an
extraordinary feat of engineering.”
cards.Body_Text: AN EYE FOR TECH - When you play this character, if an opponent has an item in play, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Gazelle - Angel with Horns
cards.Body_Text: YOU CAN REALLY MOVE - When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Goofy - Expert Shipwright
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Clever Design: Whenever this character quests, chosen character gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: Bellwether - Assistant Mayor
cards.Body_Text: FEAR ALWAYS WORKS - During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.Name: Basil - Disguised Detective
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
Twists and Turns: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may pay 1 {i} to have chosen opponent choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Olivia Flaversham - The Toymaker's Daughter
cards.Flavor_Text:
She had searched high and low in the Illuminary
for any hint of Basil. Instead, she found something
completely unexpected...

cards.Name: Bend to My Will
cards.Flavor_Text: “At last! This is where your luck runs out!”
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent discards all cards in their hand.

cards.Name: Prepare to Board!
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Bring me the treasure, bring me that ship, and bring
me Peter Pan!”
—Captain Hook
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. If a Pirate character is chosen, they get +3 {s} instead.

cards.Name: Heffalumps and Woozles
cards.Flavor_Text: If honey's what you covet, you'll find that they love it
cards.Body_Text: - A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.

cards.Name: Mosquito Bite
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Don't move. A mosquito has chosen me as her perch.
She's so...beautiful.”
cards.Body_Text: Put 1 damage counter on chosen character.

cards.Name: You Came Back
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Nobody gets left behind.”
—Stitch
cards.Body_Text: Ready chosen character.

cards.Name: MegaBot
cards.Body_Text: HAPPY FACE - This item enters play exerted.

cards.Name: Galactic Communicator
cards.Flavor_Text: The best way to keep in touch with those you're looking for.
cards.Body_Text: RESOURCE ALLOCATION - Return chosen character with 2 {s} or less to their player's hand.

cards.Name: Transport Pod
cards.Flavor_Text:
“We've reinvented the very concept of transportation.”
—Alistair Krei
cards.Body_Text: GIVE 'EM A SHOW - At the start of your turn, you may move a character of yours to a location for free.

cards.Name: Perilous Maze - Watery Labyrinth
cards.Body_Text: LOST IN THE WAVES - Whenever a character is challenged while here, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.Name: Owl Island - Secluded Entrance
cards.Body_Text: TEAMWORK - For each character you have here, you pay 1 {i} less for the first action you play each turn.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Pirate Captain
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Mariner's Might: Whenever this character quests, chosen Pirate character gets +2 {s} and gains “This character takes no damage from challenges” this turn.

cards.Name: Kakamora - Boarding Party
cards.Flavor_Text:
Moana: “Do you think they saw us?”
Maui: “They saw us.”
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

cards.Name: Kakamora - Pirate Pitcher
cards.Body_Text: DIZZYING SPEED - When you play this character, chosen Pirate character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Jasmine - Rebellious Princess
cards.Flavor_Text:
Even the smallest mouse can make the biggest
difference.
cards.Body_Text: YOU'LL NEVER MISS IT - Whenever this character quests, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.Name: Raya - Kumandran Rider
cards.Body_Text: COME ON, LET'S DO THIS - Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may ready another chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Wendy Darling - Courageous Captain
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Look Lively, Crew!: While you have another Pirate character in play, this character gets +1 {s} and +1 {l}.

cards.Name: John Silver - Ferocious Friend
cards.Body_Text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE - Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to another chosen character of yours. If you do, ready that character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Vanellope Von Schweetz - Gutsy Go-Getter
cards.Flavor_Text: “Almost got it!”
cards.Body_Text: AS READY AS I'LL EVER BE - At the start of your turn, if this character is at a location, draw a card and gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Michael Darling - Playful Swordsman
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Hoist the colors! Prepare to fight! Teddy bear at
the ready!”

cards.Name: Aladdin - Fearless Navigator
cards.Flavor_Text:
Finding your way through the Azurite Sea takes a
stout heart, plenty of courage, and more than a
little luck.

cards.Name: Markowski - Space Trooper
cards.Flavor_Text: “Just what we needed—a new place to fight bugs.”
cards.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Abu - Bold Helmsman
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Port, Abu! Port! To the left! ABU! The other way!”
—Aladdin
cards.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Courageous Sailor
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Golly, this looked a lot easier from the ship. But I
know I can make it—the crew is counting on me!”
cards.Body_Text: SOLID GROUND - While this character is at a location, he gets +2 {s}.

cards.Name: Adorabeezle Winterpop - Ice Rocket Racer
cards.Flavor_Text:
“It'll take more than that to knock me out of the
race!”
cards.Body_Text: KEEP DRIVING - While this character has damage, she gets +1 {l}.

cards.Name: Moana - Self-Taught Sailor
cards.Flavor_Text:
“You wanna tell me I don't know what I'm doing? I
know I don't!”
cards.Body_Text: LEARNING THE ROPES - This character can't challenge unless you have a Captain character in play.

cards.Name: John Darling - Sophisticated Swordsman
cards.Flavor_Text: “Get ready, Michael! Here they come!”

cards.Name: Aladdin - Intrepid Commander
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
Remember Your Training: When you play this character, your characters get +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Minnie Mouse - Pirate Lookout
cards.Flavor_Text:
Minnie leaned forward. Could it be true? Was this
the island at last?
cards.Body_Text: LAND, HO! - Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a location card from your discard to your hand.

cards.Name: Moana - Kakamora Leader
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)
Gathering Forces: When you play this character, you may move any number of your characters to the same location for free. Gain 1 lore for each character you moved.

cards.Name: Pete - Freebooter
cards.Flavor_Text:
Pete was always looking for trouble. Now he was
finally getting paid for it.

cards.Name: Goofy - Flying Goof
cards.Flavor_Text: “Hold on to yer hat!”
cards.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.Name: Maui - Half-Shark
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CHEEEEHOOOO!: Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.
Wayfinding: Whenever you play an action, gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Hades - Strong Arm
cards.Flavor_Text: “Panic, use your head for once!”
cards.Body_Text: WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO? - Banish chosen character.

cards.Name: Tigger - In the Crow's Nest
cards.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Swash Your Buckles: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +1 {s} and +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Scar - Heartless Hunter
cards.Flavor_Text:
“It's for the greater good. I'm sure you understand.”
—Scar
cards.Body_Text: TEETH AND AMBITIONS - When you play this character, deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.

cards.Name: Thievery
cards.Flavor_Text:
Apples, gems, magic lamp ...Abu's not picky as long
as there's something worth stealing.
cards.Body_Text: Chosen opponent loses 1 lore. Gain 1 lore.

cards.Name: Lead the Way
cards.Flavor_Text:
“We have what it takes to find our way through this
maze, together! Hold on—we're going in!”
cards.Body_Text: Your characters get +2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: The Islands I Pulled from the Sea
cards.Flavor_Text: So what can I say except...you're welcome
cards.Body_Text: - A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.

cards.Name: Energy Blast
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Did you really think I would fight fair?”
—Jafar
cards.Body_Text: Banish chosen character. Draw a card.

cards.Name: Longboat
cards.Body_Text: TAKE IT FOR A SPIN - Chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.Name: Gold Coin
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Sweet mother of monkey milk! A gold coin!”
—Vanellope von Schweetz
cards.Body_Text: SPARKLY ACCESS - Ready chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Card Soldier's Spear
cards.Body_Text: A SUITABLE WEAPON - Your damaged characters get +1 {s}.

cards.Name: Flotilla - Coconut Armada
cards.Body_Text: TINY THIEVES - At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, all opponents lose 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost this way.

cards.Name: Skull Rock - Isolated Fortress
cards.Body_Text: FAMILIAR GROUND - Characters get +1 {s} while here.

cards.Name: B.E.N. - Eccentric Robot
cards.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.)

cards.Name: Aunt Cass - Biggest Fan
cards.Flavor_Text: “All right, geniuses, let's feed those hungry brains.”
cards.Body_Text: HAPPY TO HELP - Whenever this character quests, chosen Inventor character gets +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Gadget Hackwrench - Creative Thinker
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Golly, a perfect wingnut! There's about a million
uses for that!”
cards.Body_Text: BRAINSTORM - Whenever you play an item, this character gets +1 {l} this turn.

cards.Name: Gadget Hackwrench - Brilliant Bosun
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gadget Hackwrench.)
Mechanically Savvy: While you have 3 or more items in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play Inventor characters.

cards.Name: Zipper - Astute Decoy
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)
Run Interference: During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, another chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Oswald - The Lucky Rabbit
cards.Body_Text: FAVORABLE CHANCE - During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an item card, you may play that item for free and it enters play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.Name: Yokai - Enigmatic Inventor
cards.Body_Text: TIME TO UPGRADE - Whenever this character quests, you may return one of your items to your hand to pay 2 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

cards.Name: Pleakley - Scientific Expert
cards.Flavor_Text:
“As the duly appointed representative for the
Galactic Council, I volunteer for this assignment!”
cards.Body_Text: REPORTING FOR DUTY - When you play this character, put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Hiro Hamada - Robotics Prodigy
cards.Flavor_Text: “A couple more tweaks and I've just about...got it!”
cards.Body_Text: SWEET TECH - Search your deck for an item card or a Robot character card and reveal it to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

cards.Name: HeiHei - Not-So-Tricky Chicken
cards.Body_Text: EAT ANYTHING - When you play this character, exert chosen opposing item. It can't ready at the start of its next turn.

cards.Name: Sour Bill - Surly Henchman
cards.Flavor_Text:
“You want to go in there? Fine. If you do, you won't
come back out.”
cards.Body_Text: UNPALATABLE - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -2 {s} this turn.

cards.Name: Nick Wilde - Soggy Fox
cards.Flavor_Text: “Glad you could make it.”
cards.Body_Text: NICE TO HAVE A PARTNER - While you have another character with Support in play, this character gets +2 {s}.

cards.Name: Wasabi - Methodical Engineer
cards.Body_Text: BLADES OF FURY - When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player gains 1 lore.

cards.Name: Nick Wilde - Sly Fox
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 1 (You may pay 1 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Nick Wilde.)
You Can't Touch Me: While you have an item in play, this character can't be challenged.

cards.Name: Gadget Hackwrench - Perceptive Mouse
cards.Flavor_Text:
“All the clues pointed to an island, but I never
thought I'd see it on a map. Golly, this is
incredible! I mean, the island actually exists, so it's
technically credible—but still! This is amazing!”

cards.Name: Dr. Delbert Doppler - Fussy Astronomer
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Of course! It all makes perfect sense. That's why
my old star charts are useless. Every star in the sky
here is different!”

cards.Name: Tadashi Hamada - Baymax Inventor
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I'm not giving up on you. You don't understand this
yet, but people need you.”
cards.Body_Text: LET'S GET BACK TO WORK - This character gets +1 {s} and +1 ? for each item you have in play.

cards.Name: Hiro Hamada - Team Leader
cards.Body_Text: I NEED TO UPGRADE ALL OF YOU - Your other Inventor characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Tadashi Hamada - Gifted Roboticist
cards.Flavor_Text: His work lives on.
cards.Body_Text: SOMEONE HAS TO HELP - During an opponent's turn, when this character is banished, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown.

cards.Name: Baymax - Personal Healthcare Companion
cards.Body_Text:
Fully Charged - If you have an Inventor character in play, you may pay 1 {i} less to play this character
You Said 'Ow' - 2 {i}: Remove up to 1 damage from another chosen character.

cards.Name: Baymax - Armored Companion
cards.Body_Text: THE TREATMENT IS WORKING - When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from another chosen character of yours. Gain 1 lore for each 1 damage removed this way.

cards.Name: Yokai - Professor Callaghan
cards.Flavor_Text:
“You are all brilliant scientists and inventors. Think
of what you could do with this little device. How do
you push the boundaries of what is possible?”

cards.Name: Hiram Flaversham - Intrigued Inventor
cards.Flavor_Text: He'll find a way to make anything mouse-sized.

cards.Name: Yokai - Scientific Supervillain
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Yokai.)
NeuroTransmitter: You may play items named Microbots for free.
Technical Gain: Whenever this character quests, draw a card for each opposing character with 0 {s}.

cards.Name: Alice - Savvy Sailor
cards.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.) 
Ahoy!: Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours gets +1 {l} and gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

cards.Name: We Could Be Immortals
cards.Body_Text: - A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.

cards.Name: Sail the Azurite Sea
cards.Flavor_Text:
You need a good plan and even better luck to make it
across these treacherous waters.
cards.Body_Text: This turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown. Draw a card.

cards.Name: Helping Hand
cards.Flavor_Text:
“When you're making the world a better place, every
little thing helps.”
—Judy Hopps
cards.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. Draw a card. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character’s {s} this turn.)

cards.Name: Prepare Your Bot
cards.Body_Text:
Choose one:
- Ready chosen item.
- Ready chosen Robot character. They can’t quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.Name: Baymax's Healthcare Chip
cards.Body_Text: 10,000 MEDICAL PROCEDURES - Choose one: • Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character. • If you have a Robot character in play, remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

cards.Name: Microbots
cards.Body_Text: LIMITLESS APPLICATIONS - You may have any number of cards named Microbots in your deck.

cards.Name: Jumbo Pop
cards.Body_Text: HERE YOU GO - Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters. Draw a card.

cards.Name: Rescue Rangers Submarine - Mobile Headquarters
cards.Body_Text: PLANNING SESSION - At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.Name: Institute of Technology - Prestigious University
cards.Body_Text: WELCOME TO THE LAB - Inventor characters get +1 {w} while here.

cards.Name: Kakamora - Long-Range Specialist
cards.Flavor_Text:
“They're very good at making trouble.”
—Maui
cards.Body_Text: A LITTLE HELP - When you play this character, if you have another Pirate character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.Name: Kakamora - Pirate Chief
cards.Body_Text: HEAD COCONUT - Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card to deal 1 damage to chosen character or location. If you discarded a Pirate character card, deal 3 damage instead.

cards.Name: Jim Hawkins - Stubborn Cabin Boy
cards.Body_Text: COME ON, COME ON, COME ON! - During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, this character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging.)

cards.Name: Mr. Big - Shrewd Tycoon
cards.Flavor_Text: “You've done me a great service.”
cards.Body_Text: REPUTATION - This character can't be challenged by characters with 2 {s} or greater.

cards.Name: Mr. Smee - Steadfast Mate
cards.Flavor_Text: “Captain Hook'd like a word with ya.”
cards.Body_Text: GOOD CATCH - During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.Name: Mr. Smee - Captain of the Jolly Roger
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mr. Smee)
Raise the Colors: When you play this character, you may deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of your other Pirate characters in play.

cards.Name: Mullins - Seasoned Shipmate
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Anything for you, Mr. Smee! Except me share o’
the plunder...”
cards.Body_Text: FALL IN LINE - While you have a character named Mr. Smee in play, this character gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Kohut - Trusted Marine
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Ma'am! I am a highly trained instrument of
tactical superiority! Maybe we could find someone
else for the gruntwork! Ma'am!”

cards.Name: King Hubert - Phillip's Father
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I told you we'd find an island eventually! Excellent
navigating. Yes, yes, I'm quite proud. Now, a toast
to our success!”

cards.Name: Hercules - Unwavering Demigod
cards.Flavor_Text:
“That maze wasn't so bad! Let's see what this
island has in store for us.”
cards.Body_Text: Challenger+2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)

cards.Name: John Silver - Ship's Cook
cards.Flavor_Text:
“At the end of the day, it's the simplest tools that
come through for you in a pinch.”
cards.Body_Text: HUNK OF HARDWARE - When you play this character, chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.

cards.Name: Mr. Arrow - Legacy's First Mate
cards.Flavor_Text:
“We're holding steady, Captain. Despite this wind.
And these waves.”
cards.Body_Text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Jim Hawkins - Rigging Specialist
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jim Hawkins.)
Battle Stations: When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.Name: Tuk Tuk - Big Buddy
cards.Flavor_Text:
Raya: “Nothing gets past Tuk Tuk. Nothing.”
Sisu: “Except butterflies! Oh, and birds!”
Raya: “Fine. Most things don't get past Tuk Tuk.”

cards.Name: Billy Bones - Space Sailor
cards.Flavor_Text: “He'll be comin’ soon. Can't let them find this.”
cards.Body_Text: KEEP IT HIDDEN - When this character is banished, you may banish chosen item or location.

cards.Name: Pluto - Guard Dog
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Good Boy: While this character has no damage, he gets +4 {s}.

cards.Name: Mickey Mouse - Night Watch
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Gee, Donald was right—it's spooky out here in
the dark!”
cards.Body_Text: BACKUP - Your characters named Pluto gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Cobra Bubbles - Former CIA
cards.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Think About What's Best: 2 {i} - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Gantu - Captain Crankyhead
cards.Flavor_Text:
“Strength in numbers is overrated. I prefer my own
strength.”

cards.Name: Wreck-It Ralph - Ham Hands
cards.Flavor_Text: “I'm very good at what I do. Probably the best I know.”
cards.Body_Text: I WRECK THINGS - Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item or location to gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Calhoun - Marine Sergeant
cards.Body_Text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Level Up: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.

cards.Name: Captain Amelia - Commander of the Legacy
cards.Body_Text: DRIVELING GALOOTS - This character can't be challenged by Pirate characters.

cards.Name: Jafar - Power-Hungry Vizier
cards.Flavor_Text:
“The broken crown's power is formidable, but not
enough. With both halves of the Hexwell Crown, I could
rule all of Lorcana!”
cards.Body_Text: YOU'LL GET WHAT'S COMING TO YOU - During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, deal 1 damage to chosen character.

cards.Name: John Silver - Stern Captain
cards.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named John Silver.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
Don't Just Sit There!: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to each opposing ready character.

cards.Name: Hot Potato
cards.Flavor_Text:
“This is not going to end well.”
—Pleakley
cards.Body_Text:
Choose one:
- Deal 2 damage to chosen character.
- Banish chosen item.

cards.Name: I'm Still Here
cards.Body_Text: - A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.

cards.Name: Twin Fire
cards.Flavor_Text:
“I got ‘em!”
“No, I got ‘em!”
cards.Body_Text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character. Then, you may choose and discard a card to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.

cards.Name: Ambush!
cards.Flavor_Text: Pirates will use any advantage they can get.
cards.Body_Text: {e} one of your characters to deal damage equal to their {s} to chosen character.

cards.Name: Unfortunate Situation
cards.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 4 damage to them.

cards.Name: King's Sensor Core
cards.Body_Text: SYMBOL OF ROYALTY - Your Prince and King characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.Name: Training Dummy
cards.Body_Text: HANDLE WITH CARE - Chosen character gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.Name: Sunglasses
cards.Flavor_Text: The coolest accessory for top agents.
cards.Body_Text: SPYCRAFT - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.Name: Treasure Mountain - Azurite Sea Island
cards.Body_Text: SECRET WEAPON - At the start of your turn, deal damage to chosen character or location equal to the number of characters here.

cards.Name: Galactic Council Chamber - Courtroom
cards.Body_Text: FEDERATION DECREE - While you have an Alien or Robot character here, this location can't be challenged.
